title: How does the job description letter look for NOC 6235? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no standard template for different NOC's. You just need to get your job roles and duties mentioned on the company letter head along with hours of service and other details..make sure that they are consistent with the duties that are provided under the NOC you choose. You can find the roles under NOC 6235 in below link. 6235 - Financial sales representatives
